mapper.select: select a.car_id "carId",a.car_color "carColor",a.car_state "carState",a.car_type "carType",a.car_cdate "carCdate",a.ower_id "owerId", b.ower_name "owerName",b.ower_phone "owerPhone",c.park_id "parkId",d.park_zone "parkZone" from t_car a,t_ower b,t_transact c,t_park d where b.ower_id = a.ower_id and c.car_id = a.car_id and d.park_id = c.park_id and a.car_state=1 and b.ower_state=1 and c.tran_state=1
